body: As you now, when you want to learn how many kills do you have, you check your Avicus Profile from   avicus.net/stats _____ . Today I wondered that how many monuments did I destroy. But we cannot see that when we look at the stats. I just really want to see my monument number. Could you please do something about that with the upcomin' new update?

title: How many monument did you...

replies.body:
2 things, its sort of there, it says monthly on how many you destroyed, hover over objectives + nebula,
and its going to be more accessable in the "Nise" update aswell as you can see here https://www.facebook.com/AvicusNetwork :P
